Keywords: Howling Commandos , Past , S.H.I.E.L.D. , Soldier , Spy
Real Name: Peggy Carter
Special Powers
YOU HAVE A SUPER SOLDIER...ME!: Stealth. // Captain Carter may start the game with Disney+ #s005 Captain Carter's Shield equipped and/or Disney+ #s001 Super Soldier Serum equipped. She may have both of these equipped at the same time.
HER ONE CHOICE GAVE BIRTH TO A WHOLE NEW HISTORY: When establishing themed teams, characters on your starting force with the Soldier or Spy keywords gain the S.H.I.E.L.D. keyword.
NOTHING THIS WOMAN CAN'T HANDLE: Invincible, Willpower.
YOU TAKE YOUR ORDERS FROM ME: Enhancement. // Leadership. When Captain Carter uses it and succeeds, once this turn, a friendly character that has S.H.I.E.L.D. team ability may use it as FREE.

NO. It is a little bit unclear by the wording of: [B]You Have a Super Soldier...Me![/B] but that trait says she can just start the game with those pieces of equipment, as opposed to the other SR Captain Carter where it is clearly +5 pts to pay, or the upcoming sword bearers, or the prior Gem Bearers.

jeanpaul07
Do I have to pay the 10 points for the ss serum and her shield to have them equipped to her at the start of a game?
June 13, 2022
Oathful
Disregarding her keyword cheating, which is always a good thing, she has a lot of damage output for her point cost and a lot of support for her team. I highly recommend pairing her with Dazzler from Empyre for a cheap Enhancement buddy that she can give a 20 def (22 against ranged), and the fact she can give characters Captain Carter might cheat onto the team the Shield TA. Also enabling a character to use the Shield TA for free when landing her Leadership rolls is really powerful if you can properly capitalize on it (usually by letting Dazzler use it free and bump Carter's damage up to 6). Thematic: 9.5/10 Viability: 9.5/10 (both starting lines) Fun Factor: 8/10, leans towards competitive

Goop
There are a lot of powers on this figure. She's one of the few pieces that was designed well in my opinion making her just a solid range figure rather than screwing up a half range/melee design. Overall great powers, great stats.
